actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Harrison School Project in Roanoke, Virginia.

summary.text: Provides that obligations issued by the Virginia Housing Development Authority on June 30, 1982, to provide financing for the Harrison School Project of Roanoke, Virginia, shall be treated as tax-exempt industrial development bonds if 75 percent or more of the proceeds of such issue are used to provide residential rental property for low-or moderate-income individuals.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Harrison School Project in Roanoke, Virginia.
